name: Commercial Lighting, 90.1 c. 2019
_description: Incremental lighting energy savings and added costs from switching between BAU commercial code in 2021 (assume 90.1-2013) and current code (90.1-2019)

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Based on comparison of lighting power densities in Table 9.5.1.; see full calculations at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tZHWcn0I0UGFjCTFRHccs_OGH5-WXufgDz5tN_TbHTc/edit?usp=sharing

source_data.title: Standard 90.1-2013 – Energy Standard for Buildings Except Low-Rise Residential Buildings
Standard 90.1-2019 – Energy Standard for Buildings Except Low-Rise Residential Buildings

installed_cost_source.notes: Assumes incremental cost between 90.1-2013 and 90.1-2019 would be similar to that of 90.1-2016 and 90.1-2019; see full calculations at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tZHWcn0I0UGFjCTFRHccs_OGH5-WXufgDz5tN_TbHTc/edit?usp=sharing

product_lifetime_source.notes: Typical commercial lighting technology lifetime, based on EIA NEMS buildings module raw data represented in Scout baselines

source_data.title: Scout technology cost, performance, and lifetime data
